channel.title: Quinn Navara's sports blog
channel.description: Recent content on Quinn Navara's sports blog

item.title: Does turning the ball over affect how many points a team scores per game
item.description: In the game of basketball, turning over the ball is one of the most detrimental things a team can do to lose a game. In order to win a game, one team has to score more points than the other. A team has a better chance of winning if they have less turnovers than their opponent, so you’d think that the less turnovers you have, the more points you’d score.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome! My name is Quinn Navara, and I am a sophomore at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln studying sports media. I’m originally from Treynor, Iowa where I played four sports. I played basketball, baseball, soccer and ran cross country. Sports has always been a big part of my life, and my passion for it continuously grows. This blog is for my Sports Data Analysis and Visualization class.
